net.sourceforge.seqware.pipeline.modules.BamFilters
Class AddRGTags

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.seqware.pipeline.module.Module
      net.sourceforge.seqware.pipeline.modules.BamFilters.AddRGTags
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModuleInterface
public class AddRGTags
extends Module

Annotate BAM file with read group tags. This module adds the read group (RG) tag to every read in a BAM file, updates the header info, and sorts the entries by coordinate. Underlying script: sw_module_AddRGTags.pl Necessary programs: perl, java, Picard (SamFormatConverter.jar & SortSam.jar), samtools Expected output: outfile

Author:
sacheek@med.unc.edu
